titleStmt.title: Concerning the nevv church discipline an excellent letter written by Mr George Cranmer to Mr R. H.
titleStmt.author: Cranmer, George, 1563-1600.
Hooker, Richard, 1553 or 4-1600.
Cranmer, George, 1563-1600.
Camden, William, 1551-1623. Annales rerum Anglicarum et Hibernicarum regnante Elizabetha. English. Selections.

notesStmt.note: Written in 1598 by Cranmer to Richard Hooker, this work was first published in 1642.
Leaf A2 contains a quotation from the English translation of William Camden's "Annales rerum Anglicarum et Hibernicarum regnante Elizabetha" on the life of Cranmer.
A reissue with the place of publication ("Oxford") stamped on the title page from type and the "5" in the date likewise stamped over the "2". The original imprint read: Printed in the yeare 1642.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
